EmailTemplate.name: NorthAM_Event_CloudFoundryWorkshop_DC_Q216.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Workshop - Tuesday, May 31
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Foundry Workshop - Government Edition. We look forward to seeing you next week. See event details below:
Date: May 31st, 2016 Time: 8:30 AM - 3:00 PM Location: Virginia Tech Executive Briefing Center <[[http://www.ncr.vt.edu/engagement/executive_briefing_center.html]]> Ballston Room 900 N. Glebe Road Arlington, VA 22203
Questions? Please contact us via events@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-foundry-workshop/dc]]>.
